name: Dungrin's Light Spire
entries: You create a light spire within range, a glowing tree-like object that has a height of 10ft. It gives off dim light in a 30ft radius, and bright light within a 10ft radius. Creatures of your choice standing within its bright light gain a +1 to all saving throws. Creatures within the dim light do not benefit from being {@condition Invisible} Creatures can only benefit from one Light Spire at a time.
